name: Jewel Flickr
author: Jewel Theme

sections.description:
Show your flickr photos form flickr, in an easy and fun way!

Features:

  • Displays Flickr photos as the style you want.
  • You can select the images in a number of coloumns that you want.
  • Fits into a sidebar widget easily.
  • Choose display type (vertical or horizontal), define no. of columns.
  • Make your own layout.
  • Order the icons – they way you like by using easy drag and drop feature.
  • Fully Responsive – compatible with mobile devices
  • User friendly and very interactive user interface</strong
  • Upgrades available
    • For more features like flickr image slider, more customization options – upgrade to Pro.
  • Support
    • Dedicated email, forum support
  • Free updates
    • Get free updates for lifetime.

Available Languages

  • English

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin

Liked jewel-flickr Plugins?

Rate us on WordPress Forum üôÇ
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

This plugin provides the ability to add your Flickr profile icons in frontend with the help of widget dynamically wherever necessary.

Where can I find the documentation for the plugin?

Once you install the plugin , you can check some general documentation about how to use the plugin in the “How to use” page of the plugin.Complete documentation can be found here.
